WizardLayout.tsx.summary: Layout wrapper that applies bottom padding based on sticky footer height so page content never sits beneath sticky elements.

keyParts.paddingLogic: if stickyVisible, apply inline style paddingBottom = stickyHeight + safe-area + extra spacing
keyParts.container: min-h-screen w-full bg-muted/[0.15] px-4 pb-20 pt-6 sm:pt-12 md:px-6 lg:px-10
keyParts.inner: mx-auto w-full max-w-5xl flex flex-col gap-10 sm:gap-12

BookingWizard.tsx.summary: Coordinates wizard state and hands step metadata + actions to the new WizardContainer/WizardNavigation shell.

keyParts.containerUsage: WizardContainer wraps WizardLayout and renders WizardNavigation with the latest StepAction[]
keyParts.layoutUsage: Passes heroRef, stickyHeight, stickyVisible, banner into WizardContainer

WizardNavigation.tsx.summary: Single sticky navigation shell for every step. Mobile-first layout with text labels, WizardProgress, StepSummary, and grouped StepAction buttons.

keyParts.grouping: StepAction.role ('primary' | 'secondary' | 'support') drives layout so confirmation actions share the same shell.
keyParts.heightReporting: ResizeObserver reports rendered height to WizardContainer for padding adjustments.

layout.outer: fixed inset-x-0 bottom-0 pointer-events-none with safe-area padding
layout.nav: rounded-3xl card with backdrop blur, houses progress, summary, separators, and responsive button rows

WizardProgress.tsx.summary: Shared progress indicator (linear bar + step pills) consumed by WizardNavigation.

keyParts.WizardSummary: { primary: string; details?: string[]; srLabel?: string }
keyParts.stepPills: ol row of numbered steps; updated to hidden on small screens and visible from md+ to keep stickies compact.

useStickyProgress.ts.summary: Hook that observes an anchorRef (usually heroRef in WizardLayout) via IntersectionObserver to control when sticky UI should appear.

keyParts.behavior: Sets isAnchorVisible based on intersection; sticky containers use their own visible flag from wizard state.
